product_name: REI Active Stretch Watch Cap - Boys'
long_description: The REI Active Stretch watch cap crowns boys' heads with a layer of cozy, breathable and formfitting warmth and coverage. Durable and quick-drying polyester and nylon blend with added spandex is easy to care for. Reflective trim enhances visibility when the sun goes down.
short_description: The REI Active Stretch watch cap crowns boys' heads with a layer of cozy, breathable and formfitting warmth and coverage.
